TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 982-983
TEI.2.document_recipient: McNeil, Woodson, D.R. and R. Mills
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to McNeil, Woodson, D.R. and R. Mills, 05-31-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to McNeil and Woodson et al., Matamoros, May 31, 1833. Advising support of George Fisher as collector of customs.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: Copy by George Fisher, Lamar Papers, Texas State Library.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 982-983

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to McNeil and Woodson et al., Matamoros, May 31, 1833. Advising support of George Fisher as collector of customs.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Matamoros */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-31-1833">31 May 1833*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mrss. McNeil and Woodson*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*and*/p* *p**person_mentioned*D. G. and R Mills*/person_mentioned*— *location_mentioned*Brazoria*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*Gentlemen. This will be handed to you by *person_mentioned*Mr. Geo.: Fisher*/person_mentioned*, who returns as*person_mentioned* Collector of Galveston*/person_mentioned*, and I particularly recommend that he be firmly sustained in the discharge of his duties, and that any excitement which may have existed heretofore may be totally forgotten, and buried in oblivion.*/p*
*p*By following this recommendation you will benefit the interest of the *person_mentioned*farmers */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*regular Merchants*/person_mentioned* and materially oblige your*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F Austin.*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*A true Copy of the original, in my possession, which I certify.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Geo. Fisher*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
